entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023
